MAN.TITLE: file_pha
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: writes phase of the field into a txt file.

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: :input field. it must be diffractive wavefront.
: the output filename, it must be a string.
: the timestamp of the outfile name. default time = -1. If the value of time is not positive,then the timestamp of the outfile will not be included.
: the grid dimension or sampling dimension (must be integer), default imax=64. it equals to grid sampling if you pass the zero to imax
: the indication whether the output file will be processed by gnuplot or fil_ter (it must be bool variant),default gnuplot = fause.
: the output field or diffractive wavefront.

DESCRIPTION.P: file_pha is similar to file_int, it writes wrapped phase distribution into a txt file which may be processed or plotted with Scilab graphical functions. One argument is necessary: the output filename. Default grid size is 64x64, you may change the default dimension with the imax argument. Files saved with file_pha and file_int (set the gnuplot paramter to 1) can also be imported with fil_ter, which automatically recognizes pgm and gnuplot formats.
